summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Hector Leija's portfolio website. All features working perfectly including theme toggle, modal functionality, responsive design, and Discord integration.
passed_tests: Hero section loads with avatar and animated rings
Theme toggle works (dark/light mode with purple-green and orange themes)
Navigation bar with CV button displays properly
Bento grid section with 5 clickable cards (Sobre mí, Estudios, Mi camino, Música, Ubicación)
Skills section displays 4 skill cards with progress bars (C#, HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
Projects section shows 3 project cards plus 'Próximo proyecto' placeholder
Process section shows 4 steps (Análisis, Diseño UI, Desarrollo, Entrega)
Contact modal opens with Discord integration, Instagram card, and social links
Scroll-to-top button appears and works correctly
All modals open correctly (bento cards, skill cards, project cards)
Mobile responsiveness (mobile menu, mobile CV button, mobile theme toggle)
